page.title: 17Working at East Brent School
page.content: East Brent c.e.v.c. First School The junior class worked on the Domesday projet to find information about this area.We went out in a minibus and drove right around the area to look at the villages and the farmland.We climbed Brent Knoll and looked at the remains of the Iron age fort.Some children interviewed people in the village to find out about the Vilage Hall and the Harvest Home.We all went to the church and looked for dates and other information.We enjoyed the work and we hope it is useful.
